query.statement:
SELECT NULL AS CODE ,NULL AS CODE_NAME FROM DUAL UNION ALL
SELECT NULL AS CODE ,'ÀüÃ¼' AS CODE_NAME FROM DUAL UNION ALL
SELECT RECIPE_CLASS AS CODE , B.CODE_NAME FROM FSA_UPJANG_RECIPE_LINK A, SCC_COMMON_CODE B WHERE A.RECIPE_CLASS = B.CODE AND B.GROUP_CODE = 'FS0001' AND A.UPJANG = #UPJANG#
